scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Box 10: Two copies of manuscript entitled "Read It and Weep" by Arthur K. Roberts; scrapbook of newspaper clippings and correspondence titled "Press Notices" (extremely brittle); scrapbook of photographs (personal portraits); fifth anniversary issue of "Beverly's Book" (produced by the Beverly Roberts Fan Club); another undated issue of "Beverly's Book," featuring photographs and biographies of Roberts' fans (extremely brittle); 30th anniversary issue of "The Echo" (produced by Filmland's Fan Club); two playbills from the Broadhurst Theatre; and loose photographs, many of the same woman (Beverly Roberts?)

Box 11: Box of photographs, notebooks, and printed ephemera labeled "photos and snaps all belong to Arthur;" loose and framed photographs; many copies of Elaine Dickson/Arthur Roberts promotional flyer; and correspondence and other materials re: the publication of Arthur Roberts' manuscript

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright (or related rights to publicity and privacy) for materials in this collection, created by Beverly Roberts was not transferred to New York University. Permission to use materials must be secured from the copyright holder.

Any rights (including copyright and related rights to publicity and privacy) held by John Greenspan and the Theatre Authority were transferred to New York University in 2001 by John Greenspan. Permission to publish or reproduce materials in this collection must be secured from Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Archives. Please contact tamiment.wagner@nyu.edu, (212) 998-2630.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Donated by Beverly Roberts, former Theatre Authority President, via Harold Hoffman, Theatre Authority President, in 1985. The accession number associated with this gift is 1950.288
Another donation was made by John Greenspan, Theatre Authority Treasurer, in 2001. The accession number associated with this gift is 1984.003.
